atk-s0402a56:2_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame asappurisanti lāmakapurisaṁ tucchapurisaṁ mūḷhapurisaṁ avijjāya andhīkataṁ bālaṁ.
atk-s0402a56:2_3: Itare dve vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a56:2_4: Yathā cettha, evaṁ ito paresu pañcasu.
atk-s0402a56:2_5: Etesu hi paṭhamaṁ pañcaveravasena desitaṁ, dutiyaṁ assaddhammavasena, tatiyaṁ kāyavacīdvāravasena, catutthaṁ manodvāravasena, pañcamaṁ aṭṭhamicchattavasena, chaṭṭhaṁ dasamicchattavasena.
atk-s0402a56:4_2: Kalyāṇanti bhaddakaṁ anavajjapuggalaṁ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a56:4_4: Kalyāṇadhammanti anavajjadhammaṁ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Dasamepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a56:4_5: Imasmiṁ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā.
